amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that U.S. businesses should be encouraged to provide assistance to sub-Saharan African countries to reduce the incidence of HIV/AIDS and consider the establishment of a Response Fund to coordinate such efforts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 3, printed in H. Rept. 106-236 to express the sense of the Congress that U.S. businesses should be encouraged to provide assistance to sub-Saharan African countries to reduce the incidence of HIV/AIDS and consider the establishment of a Response Fund to coordinate these efforts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
